examples.text: The elephant is the biggest living land animal.

definitions.definition: used for living rather than working in

examples.text: The workers' **living quarters** were cramped and uncomfortable.

definitions.definition: to hit somebody very hard several times and hurt them very much

examples.text: Get out or I’ll beat the living daylights out of you!

definitions.definition: to show by your actions or qualities that a particular fact is true

examples.text: These figures are living proof of the government's incompetence.
He is living proof that age is no barrier to new challenges.

definitions.definition: at a time, or during the time, that is remembered by people still alive

examples.text: the coldest winter in living memory
